1. Premier league: The Premier League is a organization that represents the top level of English football. It is responsible for managing and organizing the English football league for soccer teams in the top division of English football. The Premier League was formed in 1992 and is composed of 20 teams. It is one of the most popular and lucrative football leagues in the world.
